SA15dhkhetuu:10: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units, although they
SA15dhkhetuu:11: involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words are
SA15dhkhetuu:12: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
SA15dhkhetuu:13: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
SA15dhkhetuu:15: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to
SA15dhkhetuu:17: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes
SA15dhkhetuu:18: making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided, and terms
SA15dhkhetuu:19: such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
SA15dhkhetuu:20: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta fundamentally
SA15dhkhetuu:22: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the
SA15dhkhetuu:23: wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya, tadutpatti,
SA15dhkhetuu:24: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
SA15dhkhetuu:25: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
SA15dhkhetuu:26: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
SA15dhkhetuu:29: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example, -d
SA15dhkhetuu:30: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of
SA15dhkhetuu:31: using this database to make an KWIC index.

SA15dhkhetuu:312: sāmarthyasya tat-svabhāvatve apūrva-utpattir eva sā, atat-svabhāvatve
SA15dhkhetuu:313: so akāraka eva, sāmarthya-ākhyād bhāvāt kārya-utpatteḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:314: api ca sa eva tāvat sakala-sahakāri-sahitaḥ kāryaṃ kasmāt
SA15dhkhetuu:315: karoti kurvan dṛṣṭaḥ, tena karoti iti brūmaḥ. aho mahā-sāmarthyaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:318: kadācit kiṃcit kathaṃcit atra-bhavanto darśana-patham atikrāmet,
SA15dhkhetuu:320: cintā cittaṃ dunoti. na vai vayam atat-svabhāvānām asmad-darśana-
SA15dhkhetuu:321: vaśāt kārya-kriyāṃ brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. svabhāvena eva te
SA15dhkhetuu:322: tat-karaṇa-dharmāḥ, tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe ta ete
SA15dhkhetuu:323: kārakā iti. satyam, idam apy asti, svabhāvas teṣāṃ kārya-kriyā-
SA15dhkhetuu:324: dharmā, tena samasta-pratyayavatām akṛtvā na upekṣā āpattir iti.
SA15dhkhetuu:325: so akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadā eva antya-
SA15dhkhetuu:326: avasthāyām utpanna āhosvit prāg apy āsīt. āsīt, apracyuta-utpanna-
SA15dhkhetuu:328: virodhāt. tat kim idānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca; ko vā asya
SA15dhkhetuu:329: bhāṣitasya artho akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā ca svabhāvo na ca karoti iti.
SA15dhkhetuu:330: sahitas tat-svabhāvo na kevala iti cet, anyas tarhi kevalo
SA15dhkhetuu:331: anyaś ca sahitas, svabhāva-bhedo hi bhāva-bhedasya lakṣaṇam.
SA15dhkhetuu:332: na hi sa sāhitye api pararūpeṇa kartā; svarūpaṃ ca asya prāg
SA15dhkhetuu:333: api tad eva iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyā-virāmaḥ. yasya api bhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:334: kṣaṇikas tasya api kasmāt kevalo na karoti, yadi bhavet, kuryād eva.
SA15dhkhetuu:335: kathaṃ na bhavati. kṣaṇikatvāt. uktaṃ yādṛśasya kriyā. sa katham
SA15dhkhetuu:336: eka-kṣaṇa-bhāvy anyathā bhavet. yaś ca bhavati, sa eva na
SA15dhkhetuu:337: bhavati iti na ayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, kāraka-akārakayoḥ svabhāva-tad-
SA15dhkhetuu:339: yo api manyate akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā eva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:340: na sa sāhityam apekṣate, kāryaṃ tu pratyaya-antara-apekṣam
SA15dhkhetuu:341: iti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti, tasya api
SA15dhkhetuu:342: kathaṃ sa kevalo api karoty eva kāryaṃ ca tasmān na utpadyate
SA15dhkhetuu:343: iti tad-avastho virodhaḥ. na kevalaḥ karoty eva iti cet, katham
SA15dhkhetuu:344: idānīm akṣepa-kriyā-svabhāvaḥ. nanv etad eva paridīpitaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:345: bhavati karoty eva iti; kāryaṃ ca ayaṃ kevalo api samarthaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:346: san param apekṣamānaṃ katham upekṣeta. param anādṛtya etad
SA15dhkhetuu:347: prasahya kuryāt, evaṃ hy anena ātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:348: bhavati. kāryaṃ param apekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattir
SA15dhkhetuu:349: uktā bhavati, sa kevalo api samartha-svabhāva iti tata utpattiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:350: brūṣe, ete ca ekatra kathaṃ syātām. tad ayam īrśyā-śalya-vitudyamāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:351: marmā viklavaṃ vikrośati ity upekṣām arhati.
SA15dhkhetuu:353: eva bhāvānām, na tv akṣaṇikānāṃ pṛthagbhāva-sambhavānām,
SA15dhkhetuu:355: yatra tu santāna-upakāreṇa bhāvā hetutāṃ pratipadyante
SA15dhkhetuu:358: sahakriyā ucyate, na dravya-āśrayeṇa, kṣaṇike dravye viśeṣa-
SA15dhkhetuu:359: anutpatteḥ; na hi taṇḍula-ādīnāṃ dahana-ādau krameṇa svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:363: akṣepa-kāriṣu tv indriya-ādiṣu na viśeṣa-utpattiḥ parasparataḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:365: yogya-deśa-ādy-avasthā jātāḥ, te saha svabhāva-niṣpattyā jñāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:366: hetutāṃ pratipadyanta iti tatra eka-arthakriyā eva sahakāritvam.
SA15dhkhetuu:367: yatra viśeṣa-utpādanena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayās tatra hetu-
SA15dhkhetuu:368: santānaḥ pratyayān apekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāva-antara-pratilambha-
SA15dhkhetuu:370: tebhya eva viśiṣṭa-kṣaṇa-utpādāt krameṇa yāvad atiśayavato
SA15dhkhetuu:373: eva utpattir na yuktā. aviśiṣṭād viśeṣa-utpattau kāryasya api
SA15dhkhetuu:374: syāt; paraspara-viśeṣa-utpādān apekṣiṇo api sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:375: kurvīran. tena akṣaṇikānām api sahakāry-anapekṣāṇāṃ kāraṇatā
SA15dhkhetuu:376: syāt, apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāva-atiśaya-utpattiś ca na syāt. atha
SA15dhkhetuu:377: sahakāriṇā kṛta-viśeṣa eva viśeṣa-utpādāv apy upatiṣṭheta; evam
SA15dhkhetuu:378: anavasthā syāt. na ca sahakāriṇaḥ paraspara-kārya-utpāda-anuguṇa
SA15dhkhetuu:379: viśeṣa-utpādane nityaṃ yogya-avasthā yena eṣāṃ paraspara-
SA15dhkhetuu:381: viraha-darśanāt. tena ādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya
SA15dhkhetuu:382: na utpadyata iti cet, na asmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacane kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:383: udvego bhavati; yady evam api lokasya nyāya-pratītir bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:384: hanta tarhy ucyatām. na viśeṣa-utpādanād eva sahakāriṇāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:385: sahakāritvāṃ yatas tad-abhāvād viśeṣa-janane sahakāriṇo na
SA15dhkhetuu:386: syuḥ. kiṃ tarhi. eka-arthakriyāyā api. sa api bhavet parasparato
SA15dhkhetuu:387: viśeṣa-rahitānām. atha bhavet, pṛthag api bhavet; tathā ca tad
SA15dhkhetuu:388: viśeṣa-bhāvi kāryam api kevalād bhavet iti cet, pratikṣaṇam
SA15dhkhetuu:389: aparāparaiḥ pratyayair yathā bhāva-santāne viśeṣa-utpattir yogya-
SA15dhkhetuu:390: deśatā-ādy-avasthā-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca kārya-karaṇaṃ teṣāṃ ca yata
SA15dhkhetuu:391: utpattiḥ pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthye api yathā kevalānām akriyā-
SA15dhkhetuu:395: bhedād iti sarvam uktam. tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santāna-upakāra-
SA15dhkhetuu:397: kṛta-viśeṣa-janmā na bhavati anantara-kārya-vat, tat-prabhṛti ye
SA15dhkhetuu:398: viśeṣās te taj-janmānaḥ, tasya teṣāṃ ca tat-prakṛtitvād iti
SA15dhkhetuu:399: na anavasthā. tathā yady akṣaṇiko api bhāva ādya-viśeṣa-kāraṇa-vad
SA15dhkhetuu:400: ajanita-atiśayaḥ kāryaṃ kuryāt, karotu nāma; so asya svabhāvo
SA15dhkhetuu:402: api tathā syād ity uktam atat-svabhāvas tu tadā apy akāraka eva.
SA15dhkhetuu:403: tasmād akṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ na eka-arthakriyayā kaścit
SA15dhkhetuu:404: sahakāritva-niyamo na api santāna-upakāreṇa iti na tasya kaścit sahakārī;
SA15dhkhetuu:405: tasmāt kevalo api kuryāt. prāyas tu saṃghāta-sthāyī bhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:408: svabhāva-antarasya utpattir iti vyaktam; kāryasya apekṣā ity
SA15dhkhetuu:409: ucyate. kārakasya svabhāvasya prāg api bhāvo akriyā na yujyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:410: tasmād yo yad-ātmā sa sattā-mātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati;
SA15dhkhetuu:411: na bhūtvā tad-bhāve para-abhisaṃskāram apekṣate. svabhāvato
SA15dhkhetuu:412: asthiti-dharmaṇo bhāvasya na kiṃcin nāśa-kāraṇaiḥ; sthiti-dharmaṇo
SA15dhkhetuu:413: api bhāvasya nāśa-kāraṇaiḥ kim, svabhāvasya kenacid anyathā
SA15dhkhetuu:414: kartum aśakyatvāt. anyathātva-pratipattau vā tat-svabhāva eva
SA15dhkhetuu:415: na syād iti pūrva eva vikalpaḥ, tatra ca uktam. yaś ca parasmād
SA15dhkhetuu:416: anyathābhāvaḥ so aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ yaś ca aparaḥ sa kathaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:417: tasya, svabhāva-bheda-lakṣaṇatvād bhāva-bhedasya. tathā ca pūrvako
SA15dhkhetuu:418: bhāvo acyuti-dharme sthita iti na tasya anyathābhāvaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:420: svabhāva-antara-utpattiḥ pratyuktā. tatra api pūrvakasya sva-rasa-nirodhitvād
SA15dhkhetuu:421: vināśe agny-āder upādānāc ca apara eva drava-ādi-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:423: sa svayaṃ sthiti-dharmā eva, vināśa-hetv-asambhave avasthānāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:424: tasya parasmād vināśaḥ, na ca vināśo nāma aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:425: bhāva-cyutir eva vināśa iti cet, na idam uttaraṃ vikalpa-
SA15dhkhetuu:426: dvayam atikrāmati. kiṃ nityo bhāvaḥ svabhāvena āhosvid anityo iti
SA15dhkhetuu:427: vikalpe prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād anityo bhavati iti bruvāṇaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:429: bhāva-dvayaṃ ca svayaṃ ca nāśam anāśaṃ ca prāha iti
SA15dhkhetuu:430: pūrvasmin vināśa-hetur asamarthaḥ. na prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād
SA15dhkhetuu:431: anityo bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. paścād api nityo eva, eka-svabhāvatvāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:432: sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśam anāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo
SA15dhkhetuu:434: tasmāt saty asya vināśe vināśa-svabhāvena anena bhavitavyam.
SA15dhkhetuu:435: tathā api vyartho vināśa-hetur ity uktam. tena svabhāvato
SA15dhkhetuu:436: naśvare anaśvare vā bhāve na vināśa-hetor upayogaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:437: tasmād vināśe anapekṣo bhāvas tad-bhāva-niyata iti yaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:438: san sa vināśī, nāśvaratāyā nivṛttau ca sattva-nivṛttir ity
SA15dhkhetuu:440: svabhāvato naśvaratve api kaścid atat-svabhāvo api syāt, na
SA15dhkhetuu:441: hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na anvaya-vyatireka-siddhir iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:442: na, akṣaṇikatve avastutva-prasaṅgāt. śaktir hi bhāva-lakṣaṇam,
SA15dhkhetuu:443: sarva-śakti-viraho abhāva-lakṣaṇam. na ca akṣaṇya kvacit kācic
SA15dhkhetuu:445: sat tat kṣaṇikam eva iti vyāpti-siddhiḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:446: arthāntare gamye kārye kāryaṃ hetuḥ, avyabhicārāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:450: kāryaṃ svabhāvair yāvadbhir avinābhāvi kāraṇe, teṣāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:451: hetuḥ, tat-kāryatva-niyamāt, tair eva ca dharmair ye tair
SA15dhkhetuu:452: vinā na bhavanti. aṃśena janyajanakatva-prasaṅga iti cet, na,
SA15dhkhetuu:455: kasyacit kadācit kutaścit bhāve api sarvas tādṛśas tathāvidha-
SA15dhkhetuu:456: janmā iti kuto avasitam. tathā ca na anvaya-vyatirekāv iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:457: na, atad-bhāvinas tasya sakṛd api tato abhāvāt. paraspara-apekṣayā
SA15dhkhetuu:459: dhūmo agny-ādi-sāmagryā anyato api bhavet, tasya taj-janyaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:460: svabhāvo na bhavati iti sakṛd api tato na bhaved arthāntara-vat,
SA15dhkhetuu:461: na api sāmagrī taṃ janayet, ataj-janana-svabhāvatvāt sāmagry-antara-
SA15dhkhetuu:462: vat. na ca dhūmasya tad-ataj-janya-svabhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:467: viśeṣa-janitaḥ so dhūma iti kārya-kāraṇayor evaṃ svabhāva-niyamāt
SA15dhkhetuu:468: tad vijātīyād utpattir na bhavati. tat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:469: na vyabhicarati. tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya
SA15dhkhetuu:471: nanu vijātīyād api kiṃcid bhavad dṛṣṭam, tad yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:472: gomaya-ādeḥ śālūka-ādiḥ. na vijātīyād utpattiḥ. tathāvidham
SA15dhkhetuu:473: eva hi tādṛśām ādi-nimittam iti na kāraṇa-bhedaḥ. prabandhena
SA15dhkhetuu:474: vṛttau tu śarād bhavati. asti ca gomaya-itara-janman-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:475: bhedo rūpasya abhede api, na hy ākāra-tulyatā eva bhāvānāṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:476: tattve nimittam, abhinna-ākārāṇām api keṣāṃcid anyato viśeṣāj
SA15dhkhetuu:477: jāti-bheda-darśanāt. anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā
SA15dhkhetuu:479: abhedāv ity ahetukau viśvasya bheda-abhedau syātām. tathā
SA15dhkhetuu:480: hi na bhedād bheda ity abhedād api na abhedaḥ, tad-vyatiriktaś
SA15dhkhetuu:481: ca na kaścid bhāva-svabhāva ity ahetukatvād bhāvānāṃ nityaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:482: sattvam asattvaṃ vā syāt, apekṣyasya abhāvāt. apekṣayā hi
SA15dhkhetuu:483: bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti vyavasthāvāṃś ca sādhyeṣu
SA15dhkhetuu:484: sādhana-niyogo na syāt. kāraṇa-śakti-pratiniyame hi kiṃcid eva
SA15dhkhetuu:485: kasyacit sādhanāya upādīyeta, na aparam, tasya eva tatra śakter
SA15dhkhetuu:486: anyasya ca aśakteḥ, tayos taj-janana-itara-svabhāvatvena bhedāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:487: taj-janana-svabhāva-vilakṣaṇād api tasya utpattau na taj-janana-
SA15dhkhetuu:489: śakti-sāmye tu tad eva iti na kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati.
SA15dhkhetuu:496: svabhāva upalabdhiḥ, yogyatāyā bhāva-rūpatvāt. tasmād anya-upalabdhi-
SA15dhkhetuu:497: yogyatā eva anupalabdhiḥ pūrvavat. yatra yasminn upalabhyamāne
SA15dhkhetuu:498: niyamena yasya upalabdhir bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt,
SA15dhkhetuu:499: sa tat-saṃsṛṣṭaḥ, eka-jñāna-saṃsargāt. tayoḥ sator na eka-rūpa-
SA15dhkhetuu:501: eka-jñāna-saṃsargiṇoḥ paraspara-apekṣam eva anyatvam iha abhipretam,
SA15dhkhetuu:503: tad-anya iti taj-jñānaṃ tat-svabhāvo vā jñātṛ-jñeya-dharma-
SA15dhkhetuu:507: abhāva-vyavahāraṃ sādhayed iti cet, uktam atra yathā paryudāsa-
SA15dhkhetuu:508: vṛttyā apekṣāto abhāvo anupalabdhiś ca anupalabdhiḥ. na pratiṣedha-
SA15dhkhetuu:510: prasaṅgāt. tasya asaṃsṛṣṭa-rūpasya bhāva-siddhir eva aparasya abhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:511: siddhir ity anyabhāvo api tad-abhāva iti vyapadeśyate.
SA15dhkhetuu:513: vyavahāraṃ sādhayet tat-siddhi-siddho vā tad-abhāva iti
SA15dhkhetuu:514: na kaścid viśeṣaḥ, yena anupalabdhyā abhāva-vyavahāra-siddher virodhaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:515: syāt. sa eva anyabhāvas tad-viṣayā ca upalabdhis tad-abhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:516: kiṃ na sādhanam, kiṃ punar anyabhāvasya siddhir eva
SA15dhkhetuu:517: tad-abhāva-siddhir iti cet, apṛthak-siddhiḥ sambandha-abhāvāc ca.
SA15dhkhetuu:519: yat-siddhau yasya na siddhiḥ, tat tasya liṅgaṃ bhavati, dhūma-
SA15dhkhetuu:520: agni-vat. anyabhāva-siddhyā eva tad-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati, tasya
SA15dhkhetuu:523: sambandha-abhāvāc ca. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt, tasya
SA15dhkhetuu:524: tena kaścit sambandho bhavet, yathā kṛtakatva-anityatvayor eka-artha-
SA15dhkhetuu:525: samavāyo dhūmasya liṅginaś ca eka-artha-samavāyo vā ādhārādheyabhāvo
SA15dhkhetuu:526: vā janyajanakabhāvo vā. na evaṃ kaścid bhāva-abhāvayoḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:528: asti viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ śabda-artha-sambandha-vad iti cet, śabda-
SA15dhkhetuu:529: arthayos tat-pratipādana-abhiprāye sati tat-prayogāt tena saha
SA15dhkhetuu:531: ayaṃ ca atra na sambhavati iti kathaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:532: siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tan-mukhena viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:533: syāt; sa eva asati sambandhe na sidhyati; tad-asiddhau
SA15dhkhetuu:534: viṣayaviṣayibhāvo api na. anyathā itaretara-āśrayam idaṃ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:535: anyabhāvāc ca abhāva-siddhāv asamudāyaś ca sādhyaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:536: syāt. tathā ca ghaṭa-abhāvas tad-anyabhāvād iti ghaṭasya sarvatra
SA15dhkhetuu:537: sarvadā ca abhāvaḥ syāt. na, pradeśa-ādi-dharmy-abhāva-sādhanād iti
SA15dhkhetuu:538: cet; pradeśa-ādi-dharmi-viśeṣaṇa-bhūto abhāvaḥ sādhyate, na tu
SA15dhkhetuu:539: kevalaḥ; tato na asamudāyasya sādhyatā. na ca liṅga-liṅginor
SA15dhkhetuu:541: iti manyate. na, pradeśa-āder eva anyabhāvatvāt. yatra eva hi
SA15dhkhetuu:542: pradeśe yan na asti ity ucyate sa eva tena asaṃsṛṣṭo anyabhāvaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:543: tad-darśanād eva asya ghaṭo na asti iti vikalpa iti kathaṃ tasya eva
SA15dhkhetuu:545: na ca atra sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāva-kalpanā sambhavati, yena
SA15dhkhetuu:546: sāmānyaṃ hetur bhavet viśeṣo dharmī iti, tad-viśeṣa-pratipatter eva
SA15dhkhetuu:547: tad-abhāvasya pratītes tasya ca anyatra anya-abhāvāt. pratijñārthaikadeśatvāc
SA15dhkhetuu:548: ca na hetutvam. na ca yatra pradeśa-mātraṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:549: tatra ghaṭa-abhāvaḥ. tādṛśe kevale pradeśe abhāva eva iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:550: nanu tasya eva kevala iti ghaṭa-viraha iti. sa ca liṅgabhūta-
SA15dhkhetuu:551: pradeśa-pratipattāv eva siddhaḥ. kasya idānīṃ tal liṅgam. anvayasya
SA15dhkhetuu:552: anugamanaṃ ca nirarthakam. tasmād anyabhāvo na sādhanam
SA15dhkhetuu:554: asti virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ, tato anyabhāvād abhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:555: siddhir iti cet, kena kasya virodhaḥ. anyabhāvena pratiyoginaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:556: kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭo, yena liṅga-liṅginor virodhaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:557: sambandhaḥ syāt. abhāvas tu pratiyogino ghaṭasya anyabhāvena aviruddhaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:559: virodhaḥ. tasmāt sambandha-abhāvaḥ. atra apy asamudāya-sādhyatvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:562: gatyā api tad-abhāva-gatir na syād iti cet, na vai kutaścit sambandhād
SA15dhkhetuu:563: anyabhāvas tad-abhāva-gamaka iṣṭaḥ, kiṃ tv anyabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:564: eva tad-abhāvaḥ, yathoktaṃ prāk. tasya anya-asaṃsṛṣṭa-rūpasya kevalasya
SA15dhkhetuu:566: tasya kaivalyam aparasya vaikalyam iti tad-anyabhāva
SA15dhkhetuu:567: eva tad-abhāvaḥ, tad-anya-pratipattir eva ca tad-apratipattir
SA15dhkhetuu:568: iti. anyathā tasya paricchedena tato anyasya avyavacchede
SA15dhkhetuu:569: tat-pariccheda eva na syāt, tad-atadrūpayor avivekāt. ya eṣa
SA15dhkhetuu:570: vyavahāraḥ kasyacid darśanāt kvacit prāpti-parihāra-arthaḥ, sa
SA15dhkhetuu:571: na syāt. na hy ayam analaṃ paśyann api kevalam analam
SA15dhkhetuu:572: eva paśyati, yena salila-arthī na pravarteta.
SA15dhkhetuu:573: anupalambhena salila-abhāvaḥ pratīyata iti cet, ko ayam anupalambho
SA15dhkhetuu:574: nāma. yadi salila-upalambha-abhāva iti, kathaṃ so abhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:575: kasyacit pratipattiḥ pratipatti-hetur vā; tasya api kathaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:576: pratipattiḥ. tasya tato vā anyasya kasyacid apy apratipattāv
SA15dhkhetuu:578: pṛṣṭhībhava-ādy-avasthāsv apy abhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate. bhūyo api
SA15dhkhetuu:579: vicāritaṃ pramāṇaviniścaye. tasmād ayam analaṃ paśyann apy
SA15dhkhetuu:580: analo ayaṃ na salilam ity anadhyavasyan na tiṣṭhen na api
SA15dhkhetuu:581: pratiṣṭheta iti dustaraṃ vyasanaṃ pratipannaḥ syāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:582: tata eva ekasya darśanād anya-abhāva-gatir bhavati iti cet,
SA15dhkhetuu:583: katham ekaṃ dṛṣṭam anyan na asti iti pratyāyayati. kevalasya
SA15dhkhetuu:584: darśanād iti cet, idam eva asmābhir abhihitam, kasmāt tava atra
SA15dhkhetuu:585: paruṣam iva ābhāti. tasmāt tīra-adarśinā eva śakuninā paryaṭā
SA15dhkhetuu:586: api pratyāgantavyam ity alam avidyamāna-pratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:588: yady eka-paricchedād eva anya-vyavacchedaḥ sidhyati, sarvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:589: anyasya aviśeṣeṇa tatra abhāva-siddhir bhavet, na tulya-yogya-avasthasya
SA15dhkhetuu:591: iti viśeṣaṇaṃ ca na vaktavyam, anupalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānām
SA15dhkhetuu:594: tad-anyasya ātmā bhavati. anya-ātmano avyavacchede pravṛtti-
SA15dhkhetuu:595: nivṛttyor abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ. taṃ ca deśa-kāla-svabhāva-
SA15dhkhetuu:597: pracyutim asya vyavacchinatti. evaṃ hi sa tayā paricchinno
SA15dhkhetuu:598: yady anyathābhāvo vyavacchinno bhavati tathātvaṃ ca
SA15dhkhetuu:599: tasya eva bhavati na anyasya ity anyathābhūtād vyavacchindaty
SA15dhkhetuu:600: eva tat paricchinatti. evam ekasya pramāṇasya vṛttiḥ sarva-
SA15dhkhetuu:606: tasmāt kvacit pramāṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ tat paricchinatti
SA15dhkhetuu:608: sūcayati iti eka-pramāṇa-vyāpāra eṣaḥ. tathā hi kvacit pramāṇaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:610: tasya eva paricchedāt, tad-anyad eva ca tasmād vyavacchinatti,
SA15dhkhetuu:611: tatra aparicchedāt. atas tad eva pramāṇaṃ prakāra-antara-abhāvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:612: sādhayati, tasmin dṛśyamāne adṛṣṭasya tad-anyatvena sarvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:613: vyavasthāpanād atad-anyasya eva ca tattvena vyavasthāpanāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:615: tad evaṃ ekasya upalambhāt tasya tad-anya-ātmano vyavacchedaḥ,
SA15dhkhetuu:616: na tad-deśa-kālayoḥ sarvasya anyasya bhāvasya vyavacchedaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:617: tasmād atadātmā ca syāt tad-deśa-kālaś ca, rasa-rūpa-ādi-
SA15dhkhetuu:618: vat. tasmād yathoktād eva anupalambhāt kvacit kadācit
SA15dhkhetuu:620: anyabhāva-viṣaya-upalabdhir api tad-abhāvasya sādhikā iṣṭā eva,
SA15dhkhetuu:621: na tu liṅgatvena, tatra apy abhāvasya pṛthak sādhyatve
SA15dhkhetuu:623: siddheḥ. na hy anyabhāvaṃ pratipadya tat-pratipatter anvaya-
SA15dhkhetuu:624: vyatirekau prasādhya tad-abhāvaṃ pratipadyate. kiṃ tarhi.
SA15dhkhetuu:626: darśana-anantaraṃ vyavadhānena vinā idam asti idaṃ tu na asti iti
SA15dhkhetuu:627: vyavasthāpanāt, dṛṣṭānta-asiddheḥ. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yad
SA15dhkhetuu:628: yasya anvayi vyatireki ca. na hy evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anya-
SA15dhkhetuu:629: bhāva-upalabdhis tatra tad-abhāva iti, tad-eka-upalabdheḥ kvacid apy
SA15dhkhetuu:630: abhāvāt. sāmānyena pradarśane dṛṣṭānte api pramāṇa-antara-abhāvāt
SA15dhkhetuu:631: sā eva tad-anyabhāva-upalabdhiḥ sādhya-dharmasya sādhikā iti
SA15dhkhetuu:633: tasmān na kutaścil liṅgād abhāva-siddhiḥ. so anyabhāvaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:636: sā iyaṃ tridhā anupalabdhiḥ. siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:640: anyabhāva-siddher eva. sa tatra asiddhaḥ kārya-vyāpyayor abhāvam
SA15dhkhetuu:641: abhāva-vyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati. svabhāva-anupalabdhau tv anupalabdhyā
SA15dhkhetuu:645: ca sādhayataḥ sā ca anupalabdhis tayor upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
SA15dhkhetuu:646: prāptāv eva asad-vyavahārasya sādhikā, kathaṃ tayoḥ parokṣe
SA15dhkhetuu:647: arthe prayogaḥ. na eva prayogaḥ pramāṇatayā, liṅgasya aniścayāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:649: parasya avaśyam abhāva-niścaya iti darśana-artham ete prayujyete.
SA15dhkhetuu:650: ity eṣa pakṣa-dharmo anvaya-vyatirekavān iti tad-aṃśena
SA15dhkhetuu:651: vyāptas tri-lakṣaṇas trirūpa eva hetur gamakaḥ, sva-sādhya-
SA15dhkhetuu:653: ṣaḍ-lakṣaṇo hetur ity apare. trīṇi ca etāny abādhita-viṣayatvam
SA15dhkhetuu:655: tatra abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
SA15dhkhetuu:656: bādha-avinābhāvayor virodhāt. avinābhāvo hi saty eva sādhya-
SA15dhkhetuu:657: dharme bhāvo hetoḥ. sa hetus tal-lakṣaṇo dharmiṇi syāt, atra
SA15dhkhetuu:658: ca sādhya-dharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet. pratyakṣa-anumāne hi
SA15dhkhetuu:660: tasmin saty eva hetur bhavaṃs taṃ tatra eva dharmiṇy avasthāpayati
SA15dhkhetuu:661: iti paraṃ bata bhāvānām asvāsthyam. anyatra
SA15dhkhetuu:662: sādhya-dharmeṇa avinābhāvī hetur na dharmiṇy eva iti cet, tat
SA15dhkhetuu:663: kim ayaṃ tapasvī ṣaṇḍham udvāhya putraṃ mṛgyate. yasya
SA15dhkhetuu:664: dharmiṇy asaty api sādhya-dharme bhāvas tam upadarśya
SA15dhkhetuu:665: kathaṃ sa dharmī sādhya-dharmavān ity ucyate. ata eva bādhā
SA15dhkhetuu:666: bhāva uktaḥ; syād etat: yata eva hetur anyathā api bhavet, ata
SA15dhkhetuu:667: eva pramāṇābhyām abādhita-dharmā dharmī ity ucyate iti tat
SA15dhkhetuu:668: kim idānīṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam abādhayā eva sādhya-siddheḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:670: sādhya-siddhir iti vyartho hetuḥ; bādhāyām api, sādhana-sāmarthya
SA15dhkhetuu:671: abhāvāt. aniyame na ca bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhya-abhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:672: ca sambhava iti na sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:673: na bādhāyā abhāvo abādhā. kiṃ tarhi. bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:674: sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādha-asambhave api syād iti sa
SA15dhkhetuu:675: hetu-prayogasya viṣayaḥ. kiṃ nu vai hetur bādha-upalabdher api
SA15dhkhetuu:676: bibheti, na punar bādhāyāḥ, yena bādhām anādṛtya apy anupalabdhau
SA15dhkhetuu:677: prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ. sa tarhi hetuḥ paramārthena
SA15dhkhetuu:678: bādhā kim asti na asti ity anapekṣya bādhā-anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:679: kim arthaṃ prayujyate. sādhya-siddhy-artham. sa kiṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:680: kvacit satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayet, yena asyā abhāva
SA15dhkhetuu:681: niścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuś ca prayujyate. tathā
SA15dhkhetuu:682: ca abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, bādhāyām
SA15dhkhetuu:683: api satyām asya sāmarthyāt; tathā ca anabhyupagamye saṃśayitasya
SA15dhkhetuu:685: apy abhyupagamya prayujyate, tathā bādha-upalabdhāv api
SA15dhkhetuu:687: na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ sāmarthyam iti cet, yady evaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:689: prayogaṃ na arhati. bādhā-anupalambhe sāmarthyam iti cet, kim
SA15dhkhetuu:690: upalambho bādhāṃ vyāpnoti, yata evaṃ hetor bādhā-sambhava-
SA15dhkhetuu:691: kṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhavet. atha tan-nivṛttau bādhā
SA15dhkhetuu:692: nivartate, tathā api bādhā-anupalambhād eva sādhya-siddher vyartho
SA15dhkhetuu:693: hetuḥ, anupalambhe bādhāyā asambhavāt. upalambhasya nivṛttāv
SA15dhkhetuu:694: api bādhāyā anivṛttau tad-avasthaṃ hetor asāmarthyam
SA15dhkhetuu:695: ity aprayogaḥ. tasmāt sva-sādhya-bhāva-abhāvābhyām anyathā api
SA15dhkhetuu:696: bhavan hetur dharmiṇi kiṃcin na bhāvayati na vibhāvayati ity
SA15dhkhetuu:697: upakṣepo na samarthaḥ. tan na bādhā-avinābhāvau sahāvasthitau;
SA15dhkhetuu:700: vā bhavet, yasya bhāve api yasya anyasya abhāvaḥ. tad yathā
SA15dhkhetuu:701: pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti. na ca etad bādhāyā avinābhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:702: sati sambhavati iti na sādhya-viparyaya-avibhāvinor hetu-viruddhayor
SA15dhkhetuu:703: viṣaye bādhā sambhavati iti na tad-abhāvaḥ pṛthag
SA15dhkhetuu:704: anayor lakṣaṇa-antaratvena vācyaḥ. tasmād hetoḥ prayoge
SA15dhkhetuu:705: pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ sambhavo na asti. na api kevalā pratijñā
SA15dhkhetuu:707: etena eka-saṃkhyā-vivakṣā api pratyuktā. katham. eko hi sva-
SA15dhkhetuu:708: sādhya-bhāva eva bhāvāt tad-avyabhicārī. tatra eva tasmād anyas
SA15dhkhetuu:709: tad-bādhakasya eva bhāvāt tad-viruddha ity atra bādhayā
SA15dhkhetuu:711: api ca kiṃ vastuto asambhavat-pratihetuḥ sa samyag-jñāna-
SA15dhkhetuu:712: viparyaya-hetur āhosvid apradarśita-pratihetuḥ kiṃ ca ataḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:714: etat. hetv-abhāvo vā. na hy aniścita-ātmanaḥ pratipādaka-dharmasya
SA15dhkhetuu:716: na api sandigdha-lakṣaṇo hetur bhavati iti na kaścid hetur
SA15dhkhetuu:717: bhavet. tulya-lakṣaṇe hi dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyogi-sambhavo adṛṣṭa-
SA15dhkhetuu:718: pratiyogiṣv api śaṅkām utpādayati, viśeṣa-abhāvāt; sati vā
SA15dhkhetuu:719: viśeṣe hetor lakṣaṇam; tato hi hetur ekāntena nirasta-pratipakṣaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:720: sva-sādhyaṃ niścāyayati ity atal-lakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt. tathā ca
SA15dhkhetuu:722: hīyeta svalakṣaṇa-yuktayor hetvor ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena upanipāte
SA15dhkhetuu:723: viruddhāvyabhicārī iti. na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:725: utpaśyāmaḥ. tasmān na asty eva viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā
SA15dhkhetuu:726: bhavitavyam; dṛṣṭa-pratihetor api hetoḥ prāg itareṇa na kaścid
SA15dhkhetuu:727: viśeṣo lakṣyate. na ca sambhavat-pratihetūnām api sarvadā
SA15dhkhetuu:728: tasya upalabdhiḥ; atiśayavatī tu prajñā-utprekṣiṇī dṛṣṭā. tena aniścayaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:731: atha apradarśita-pratihetuḥ, yathā āha: yadā tarhi śabdatvaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:732: nityam abhyupagacchati, tadā ayaṃ hetur eva syāt, yady atra anityatva
SA15dhkhetuu:733: hetuṃ kṛtakatva-ādi kaścin na darśayed iti. idam aprakāśyam
SA15dhkhetuu:734: apy asaṃvaraṇīyam api iti kaṣṭhataraṃ vyasanam āyātaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:735: kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta. sa tāvad ayaṃ hetur vastūni
SA15dhkhetuu:739: vastūni tāṃś ca puruṣān tadbhāva-sampadaḥ pracyāvya-
SA15dhkhetuu:740: bhraṣṭa-rājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati iti kiṃ atra brūmaḥ.
SA15dhkhetuu:741: puruṣa-pratibhākṛtaṃ ca sādhanatvam. tat kiṃ vastutaḥ
SA15dhkhetuu:742: sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā. sa ca hetuḥ svabhāvatas tad-dharma-bhāvī
SA15dhkhetuu:743: yadi katham anyathā kriyeta, vastūnāṃ svabhāva-anyathābhāvasya
SA15dhkhetuu:745: ca katham anyadā api sādhanaṃ kasyacit.
SA15dhkhetuu:750: bhaviṣyati. kiṃ-rūpāl liṅgād artho jñātavya iti cintāyāṃ pratipattur
SA15dhkhetuu:753: pratyayāt pravṛttim avalambate. tathā yad asya ātma-rūpaṃ tal
SA15dhkhetuu:754: lakṣaṇam, na tu pararūpam. pratipatti-janmany upayoga-mātrāt
SA15dhkhetuu:756: tal-lakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet, na hi teṣv asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati.
SA15dhkhetuu:757: niścita-grahaṇaṃ tarhi na kartavyam. na na kartavyam,
SA15dhkhetuu:759: hetum icchatāṃ na eva samartho hetur bhavati, sator api
SA15dhkhetuu:761: gamaka iti jñāpana-arthaṃ niścita-grahaṇam. tena pararūpaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:762: lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, tena liṅgasya rūpa-viśeṣa-anabhidhānāt, tau
SA15dhkhetuu:764: abhāvāt. tena, yady api bhāva-abhāva-vacana-mātreṇa tat-sādhana-
SA15dhkhetuu:767: sattā-vyavasthāyās tayor eva sattā-prasiddher iti sarvatra
SA15dhkhetuu:768: sattā-vyavasthā eva tat-sādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākarṣati. parārthatvāc
SA15dhkhetuu:770: arthasya iti tad rūpaṃ ye na vidanti, na teṣāṃ tataḥ pravṛttir iti
SA15dhkhetuu:771: para-upalakṣaṇatvād yady api jñānaṃ siddham, tathā api tāv eva
SA15dhkhetuu:773: tan-niṣedha-artho niścita-śabda uktaḥ, sator api bhāva-abhāvayor
SA15dhkhetuu:774: anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ sattāyāṃ saṃśayāt. tasmād yataḥ sattā-
SA15dhkhetuu:775: prasādhaka-pramāṇād anayor niścayas tad-adhīnā iti jñāpana-artham
SA15dhkhetuu:778: pṛthag ato jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, tena eva arthasya avagatatvād
SA15dhkhetuu:780: api tarhi na pṛthaktvam, ekasya prayogād ubhaya-gater
SA15dhkhetuu:781: iti cet, na, hetoḥ sapakṣa-asapakṣayor bhāva-abhāvayor aparaspara-
SA15dhkhetuu:782: ākṣepāt; ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayati ity ucyate,
SA15dhkhetuu:783: na eko artho dvitīyasya. nanu tatra eva bhāvo tad-abhāve
SA15dhkhetuu:784: ca abhāva iti vākye paraspara-ākṣepa iti cet, vacanam etad ekasya
SA15dhkhetuu:786: ubhayam ākṣipati na punaḥ kevalau bhāva-abhāvāv ākṣipataḥ;
SA15dhkhetuu:787: niyamavantau ca na kevalau, niyamasya ubhaya-rūpatvāt.
SA15dhkhetuu:788: tasmāt tatra eva bhāva iti na bhāva eva ucyate, itareṇa api na abhāva
SA15dhkhetuu:789: eva, yena bhāvo abhāvo vā dvitīyam ākṣipet. na evaṃ jñānaṃ
SA15dhkhetuu:790: para-upalakṣaṇāt trailakṣaṇyād vyatirekitam iti na lakṣaṇa-antaram.
